source: light at the end of the tunnel
lemma: light at the end of the tunnel
definitions: A sign or indication that a difficult period or situation is coming to an end.
A future prospect of improvement or relief after a period of hardship.
examples: After months of struggle, they finally saw light at the end of the tunnel.
The new treatment offered light at the end of the tunnel for patients.
Finding a solution provided light at the end of the tunnel for the team.
